description: This file defines a React functional component named 'FiltersSidebar' that renders a sidebar with product filters including sizes, fragrance families, collections, colors, price ranges, and badges. It manages filter options, selected filters, and user interactions such as toggling and clearing filters.

methods.name: FiltersSidebar({ facets, selected, counts, onToggle, onClear })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a filter sidebar with various filter groups, handling toggling and clearing of filters.

ctags.name: FiltersSidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function FiltersSidebar({ facets, selected, counts, onToggle, onClear }) {$/
